The user infuses [[chakra]] by placing both hands on the ground, making sand particles [[Wikipedia:Polarizer|polarise]] which is able to bend light, they erupt in the direction of the users comrades, covering them and rendering them invisible and much harder to detect, save by a sensor. This technique appears to require ample time to perform for the build-up of chakra.
